ComicInfo.Title: New Mutant Order, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Old Hob has perfected the art of making mutants! With the ranks of his mutant gang swelling, the Turtles will have to determine if they can truly trust Hob against the Foot. Throw in Alopexâ€™s return to New York and the mutant mayhem will only get crazier!
